body:
Vinu,

I put back the [ability to run shades with the 'Run Energy Simulation' component](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/commit/c39a9a2bbeaa6630876daef0e5c033c11a00f273).  This doesn't lessen my suggestion that you should start a transition to using the OpenStudio component since this will ultimately enable you to model full HVAC systems.

Please sync with the github and let me know if it solves your issue.

-Chris
